Get UK Electoral Boundaries

Source: R/get_sf.R
read_elec.Rd

read_elec downloads Electoral Boundaries from the ONS Open Geography Portal.

read_elec(
  geog,
  year = 2018,
  nations = c("E", "W", "S", "N"),
  type = "BGC",
  crs = 4326
)

Arguments

geog

Type of electoral boundaries ("WM", "EU", "WPC" or "WPR")
year

Year (2018 ONLY)
nations

For which UK nations (c("E", "W", "S", "N"))
type

Boundary Clipping

- "BFE": Full Resolution Extent of the Realm (Low Tide)

- "BFC": Full Resolution Clipped (High Tide)

- "BGC": Generalised (20m) Clipped (High Tide)

- "BUC": Ultra Generalised (500m) Clipped (High Tide)
crs

Coordinate Reference System (ESPG).

It is recommend to use 4326 (World Geodetic System) or potentially 27700 (UK OS British National Grid)

Value

Output is a simple feature object containing the relevant boundaries.

Details

Boundaries included:

- Westminster Parliamentary Constituencies ("WM")

- European Union Parliamentary Constituencies ("EU")

- Welsh Parliament Constituencies ("WPC")

- Welsh Parliament Regions ("WPR")

Examples

read_elec("EU")
#> Simple feature collection with 12 features and 10 fields
#> geometry type:  MULTIPOLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -8.649996 ymin: 49.86476 xmax: 1.763571 ymax: 60.86078
#> geographic CRS: WGS 84

if (FALSE) {
read_elec("WM")
}
